1152587411060828284.Text: These are the rules of House Redoran. Steal from my kin, strike my kin unprovoked, or murder my kin, and I shall be cast out and called enemy. I must not break my word of honor. I must know my place, serve my superiors, and do my duty to my House. I must respect the teachings of the Tribunal. I must defend my House, my People, and my Honor.
